headline: AYURVEDA Announces Layoffs to Reduce Operational Costs
description: To optimize costs, AYURVEDA announced layoffs, a measure that affected its stock price, which now stands at <:kasiko_coin:1300141236841086977> 124.4.

headline: TENJIKU Faces Temporary Setback Amid Regulatory Changes
description: New regulations in the Real Estate industry have created temporary challenges for TENJIKU, with its stock now at <:kasiko_coin:1300141236841086977> 50.8.

headline: RIZZLER Faces Temporary Setback Amid Regulatory Changes
description: New regulations in the Fashion industry have created temporary challenges for RIZZLER, with its stock now at <:kasiko_coin:1300141236841086977> 194.6.
